snippet: Unlike many of his predecessors, the president’s tastes lean toward the literary, in keeping with a man whose first memoir deeply explored issues of race and self.
abstract: White House Memo; some two dozen volumes purchased by Pres Obama at the Politics and Prose bookstore in Washington, DC, offer glimpse into his private concerns and aspirations; Obama's tastes have tended more towards fiction than those of earlier presidents, who often read histories and biographies.
lead_paragraph: Unlike many of his predecessors, the president’s tastes lean toward the literary, in keeping with a man whose first memoir deeply explored issues of race and self.

headline.main: In Obama’s Book List, Glimpses of His Journey
headline.print_headline: In Obama’s Book List, Glimpses of His Journey

keywords.value: Politics and Prose (Washington, DC, Retail Store)
keywords.name: organizations
